channel.description:

Thanks everyone for your support, We couldn't of done this without the help of the Moparscape community

Wear it with pride ;)

item.title: Request lock - team achieved
item.dc:creator: @Andys_Awesome Andys Awesome
item.description:
@Andys_Awesome wrote:

[quote=“lugmfr, post:78, topic:457048”]How old are you?:
You currently need msn (we will just use the forum/shoutbox soon), username?:
What position do you want? (Server Programmer, Gfx Artist, Tester): Server Programmer
On a scale of 1-10 how familiar are you at programing PI? Ignore if not applying for this position. 8
What time zone are you in?: Eastern
How many hours a week can you be active?: Depends on my hours at work. Atleast 5-7 Hours/daily.
Why do you want to become part of this server?: I’m looking to get involved with a steady project and this seems to suit my tastes.
Any Suggestions?: Yes ofc, add me to the development team:)[/quote]
Unfortunately I have 2 Server programmers that are too good for their own good

Request Lock Dev team achieved

item.title: Request lock - team achieved
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Andys Awesome, post:71, topic:457048”]:rolleyes: nonsence

public static void main(String[] args) { int tutorialStart = 1; int tutorialProgress = 0; int tutorialFinish = 3; if (tutorialProgress) = tutorialStart;{ System.out.println("Please complete the tutorial before moving on.. " + a + //says stuff else (tutorialProgress == tutorialFinish) { // the "Method" System.out.println("Congratulations on finishing the tutorial!! " + a + //says stuff

made sence to me to have (c.tutorialProgress) be a method, learned java on my own from rsps so I come far off track from the “correct way” haha, but this is what I thought you were saying, And PI is alot neater then delta imo.[/quote]
DELTA FTW!

Read full topic

Method? What method?
[/quote]

He tried, give him some credit.

Your not calling anything in the if statement, your seeing if that clause is true. If tutorialProgress is 1, do whatever.[/quote]
Dang it, I thought I saw this as delta and hopped on… I can’t code PI xD

item.title: Request lock - team achieved
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Andys Awesome, post:67, topic:457048”][quote author=wildskiller link=topic=559984.msg4100485#msg4100485 date=1347400504]
Wtf? How many people you gonna accept?
[/quote]

People come and go, I will accept (3). I have brought on about 5-6 and 2 have stayed with me for 2 full weeks so far<3 and we could use another gfx.

Working on webclient atm so Ill show a pic.

1y26nr.png774×556

Having tons of programmers is (never) a good thing. IMO, it causes drama, and if you’re using a file sharing network such as dropbox… a lot of shit could go wrong.

Won’t use dropbox until I get to know/trust the team more. And I agree I plan on 3. I only have 2 active programmers and myself atm.

Wtf? How many people you gonna accept?

He’s like me lol.

[hr]

Okay, I WILL join IF you tell me this:

When I do:

if (c.tutorialProgress == 1) {
//say stuff
}

Why can’t I do = instead of ==?

because = is an assignment operator… c.tutorialProgress is a method your calling == 1[/quote]

c.tutorialProgress is a method your calling == 1

Method? What method?

Read full topic

because = is an assignment operator… c.tutorialProgress is a method your calling == 1

And in response to all the positive/negative feedback , Everyones working hard, Learning, and making good progress. This is what we planed and came to do, and will continue to do.

item.title: Request lock - team achieved
item.dc:creator: @Andys_Awesome Andys Awesome
item.description:
@Andys_Awesome wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:55, topic:457048”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=559984.msg4096425#msg4096425 date=1346893791]

I’m dropping out, to be honest, he doesn’t really seem mature enough to get this server started.

Droping out? You joined last night? and I was there with you for hours? You didn’t even do anything lol

Meh, the server really isn’t good. You are really interested in a bad economy from what i’ve summed up.
[/quote]
Details pl0x[/quote]
I Pre-Screen everyone new by sending them the client and having them check out everything the server has to offer before I even allow them to join the team. This was around 8-9pm. Myself and another member talking with him on MSN all had a few laughs and started sorting out what we should get done. He said he liked what he saw so I sent him the source, We continued chatting for quite a while and I went to sleep at midnight. When I woke up this was his post, I can honestly say I didn’t see this one coming lol. I was never immature and this is an “Eco Server” so this will be a stable eco. (I have now edited the Thread to say. //We are not going live until 9/24/2012, We wil be online for a very long time. If you don’t plan on being Staff for more then a month There is no need even applying)
hope this clears a few things up. I assure everyone I am here to see this project breaks all limitations.
~ Andy

[quote=“Hale M3, post:56, topic:457048”]How old are you?: 16
You currently need msn (we will just use the forum/shoutbox soon), username?: umran_is_the_best@hotmail.com
What position do you want? (Server Programmer, Gfx Artist, Tester): Gfx and can also help editting videos
On a scale of 1-10 how familiar are you at programing PI? Ignore if not applying for this position.
What time zone are you in?: Currently in Australia UTC/GMT
How many hours a week can you be active?: a whole week, 56 hours I spend 8 hours a day
Why do you want to become part of this server?: I see alot of potential in this
Any Suggestions?: Right now, nothing[/quote]

accepted! add me on msn Andyragnus@hotmail.com or on skype username andyrsps , Welcome to the team!!! Please register on our forums also @ Ragnosisle.com I will add you to the Dev team tomorrow morning.

~Andy

Read full topic
